name: Call Of War: Frontlines
summary:
From the Frontlines, raise an army and overpower other players!

The world is on the brink of war. You can play in real-time. Show your skills with tank clashes, naval battles, air combat and nuclear weapons! In Call of War you influence the fate of many nations.

Play as the leader of one nation when a worldwide conflict seems inevitable. It all boils down to one question: What is your strategy? Find your allies, build up your economy and conquer enemy territory. Research new technologies and secret weapons. Be the first to develop the ultimate bomb and even rockets to become the one true superpower! It is up to you to end the war and bring balance to the world!

Call of War offers a one of a kind gameplay environment to simulate worldwide conflicts on many different multiplayer maps all over the world. Control and develop a huge real-time army roster and jump into synchronic multiplayer matches. Battle it out over several weeks until victory conditions are met and the true world dominating superpowers are revealed!
